mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.o_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as sale_date, COUNT(DISTINCT o.o_id) as order_count, IFNULL(SUM(o.total_price), 0) as total_sales FROM orders o WHERE o.o_datetime BETWEEN DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY DATE(o.o_datetime) ORDER BY sale_date ASC;

SELECT p.p_name, p.p_price, COUNT(od.od_id) as od_count, SUM(od.od_price) as od_price, p.category_path as catePath FROM product p JOIN order_detail od ON p.p_id = od.p_id JOIN orders o ON od.o_id = o.o_id WHERE o.o_datetime >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.category_path ORDER BY od_price DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT o.o_id, o.o_datetime, u.u_name, o.total_price, od.od_delivery_status FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.u_id = u.u_id JOIN order_detail od ON o.o_id = od.o_id GROUP BY o.o_id ORDER BY o.o_datetime DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT b.b_id, b.b_title, b.b_datetime, b.b_views, b.b_writer FROM board b WHERE b.b_type = 'NOTICE' ORDER BY b.b_datetime DESC LIMIT 5
